Title: Shaitan
Writer: Abhijeet Shirish Deshpande (dialogue), K.S. Krishnan (lyrics), Bejoy Nambiar, Megha Ramaswamy, Colin Terrence (lyrics)
Actors: Kalki Koechlin, Shiv Pandit, Gulshan Devaiah, Rajeev Khandelwal
Plot: Five substance-abusing friends decide to fake a kidnapping in order to bribe a police constable for covering-up a hit-and-run accident.
